Sentencas: In the undoped LaCoO3 system, CoO2- and LaO-terminated (001) surfaces are the most stable of all the considered surfaces under typical operational conditions of the solid oxide fuel cells (T = 1100 K, p(O2) = 0.2 atm), while Sr-doping in the LaCoO3 crystal destabilizes the CoO2-terminated surface with respect to the La0.75Sr0.25O-terminated surface.
Titulo: Density functional theory calculations of atomic, electronic and thermodynamic properties of cubic LaCoO3 and La1-xSrxCoO3 surfaces
